page.title: 20Conclusion
page.content: In compiling the Domesday Survey,we have found it to be a worthwhile, exciting & enjoyable experience.We see ourselves in the unique position of linking the past of William I & his Domesday Book,1085,to the future through us - the children,the teacher & all the people involved in this Survey, 1985 & the Computer. In researching our Block,we have been out in cars and minibus to survey the area.From our studies,we have made our own Domesday Books in writing & drawing We thank all those who have helped us:- the Farmers,the Secretary at Parkplace School,the Matron at Remenham Place Old People's Home,the Owner of Temple Combe South Oxon District Council,Police,Bus Companies,Henley Standard,& others.We have read many books & leaflets,in particular,The Book of Henley,G.Tomalin HARPSDEN SCHOOL CHILDREN & HEADMISTRESS
